org.encog.matrix
Class MatrixCODEC

java.lang.Object
  org.encog.matrix.MatrixCODEC

public final class MatrixCODEC
extends java.lang.Object

MatrixCODEC: The matrix CODEC can encode or decode a matrix to/from an array of doubles. This is very useful when the neural network must be looked at as an array of doubles for genetic algorithms and simulated annealing.

Method Summary

Method Detail

arrayToNetwork

public static void arrayToNetwork(java.lang.Double[] array,
                                  BasicNetwork network)
Use an array to populate the memory of the neural network.

Parameters:
array - An array of doubles.
network - The network to encode.

networkToArray

public static java.lang.Double[] networkToArray(BasicNetwork network)
Convert to an array. This is used with some training algorithms that require that the "memory" of the neuron(the weight and threshold values) be expressed as a linear array.

Parameters:
network - The network to encode.
Returns:
The memory of the neuron.
